    • showBoardPage_UniqueBoard

      public void showBoardPage_UniqueBoard()
      Method that load the UniqueBoard fxml page only the first time that is called, then it will no longer create new controllers or load new pages. Every action made in every phase of the turn call this method for updating the scene in SantoriniStage.
